title: What are some examples of a preface? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Preface” means: “an introduction to a book, typically stating its subject, scope, or aims” (from Google). So if you want examples of some prefaces, look up Google with the question: what are the titles of some books on X (you pick the subject). And then you will get the chance to review a portion of each of these books- choose the “preface” portion, and you will have your examples.
